Zen 2 Buy is a simple to use visual shopping list application.

Features:
+ Quickly compose shopping lists by clicking on icons in the "StoreHouse"
+ Quickly increase the amount by clicking multiple times on the same icon
+ Quickly deselect an item by clicking and dragging the mouse outside the icon
+ Quickly add new products to your shopping list by long pressing on the + icon
(Great for quickly adding new custom items that you need to buy only once)
+ Share your shopping list via email ( A default email needs to be setup that can open mail to urls. The shared URL can be opened in any browser with HTML5 support on iPhone, Android, Mac etc. )
+ Compose your list on PC on zen2buy.com then send it to your Phone via email.
+ Save shopping lists for later usage
+ Add multiple saved shopping lists to the current list (For example you can save lists of ingredients for various recipes and then add the recipe you want to cook today to the current shopping list )
+ Add new products to the "StoreHouse"
+ Remove products that you don't use from the "StoreHouse"
+ Embed your shopping list in your website. ( Great for websites with Cooking Recipes )
+ Quickly see the description of a product icon by long pressing it
+ See your list in icon and text mode.
+ In text mode you can sort your current list.
+ The order of products in "StoreHouse" will adapt to your usage. Products purchased more often will be first in each category.
+ Works Offline

You can use Zen2Buy offline, You can also use it on modern mobile devices with browsers supporting html5.
While online you can send your list to your partner's email, who can open it on his mobilde device...

You don't have to type anything just click on icons to navigate and mark products for your list. This way creating a list is a matter of seconds not minutes.

You can increase quantity by clicking multiple times on a marked product.

To deselect a product click it and drag (swipe) outside the product.


The application is in beta stage.
Suggestions are welcome.
